key_risks: Regulatory dependence on FCC approvals and spectrum policies
Slow market adoption of private LTE networks in the utility sector
Persistent financial losses and challenges in achieving profitability
Competition from other spectrum holders and technology providers
controversies: Investor frustration over slow utility sector adoption and lagging stock performance
Complex and time-consuming utility contract processes delaying revenue realization
social_issues: Investor concerns over management's ability to meet growth expectations
governance_issues: Leadership transition with the appointment of a new board chairman
